name: Taily
author: M_Design

sections.description:
By adding the Tailwind framework to your WordPress in a completely dynamic way, you can design and style all parts of your site using this powerful framework, this plugin is also a new and suitable platform for developing WordPress Themes in a more optimal & faster way. This plugin also is compatible with the default WordPress page builder, Gutenberg, and the very popular Elementor page builder.

Updates

you may Update only from the official WordPress plugin repository

Uninstalling

Before deleting the plugin, you can delete all the information of this plugin in your site’s database forever by activating the Clearing while Uninstall option when deleting.

compatibilites

woocommerce
Gutenberg Page-Builder
Elementor Page-Builder
Ajax-Loader (Plugin)
standard themes like woodmart/store-front and many more

Settings-Page

Look for the settings page named as (Taily) of this plugin in the WordPress Main-Menu side-bar

Support

Unfortunately, support for this plugin is not available at this moment, But in very urgent cases, you can contact us through our official email as well as our team’s Telegram
sections.installation: To install the plugin, just search the term Taily or Tailwind in the wordpress repository!
sections.changelog:
1.0.04 – 3.11.2024

  • Initial release of Plugin

1.0.06 – 4.11.2024

  • Some initial Debugs
  • Solved Security issues

1.0.07 – 4.18.2024

  • Solved Some Security issues

1.0.10 – 4.25.2024

  • Solved Some Security issues
  • Added WordPress Best-Practice Security enhancements

1.0.11 – 5.25.2024

  • Some enhancements
  • Plugin Translations changes

1.0.20 – 7.8.2024

  • Some enhancements
  • Debugs
  • Added new Advanced-option (add Tailwind CDN js file locally)

1.0.21 – 7.8.2024

  • Important Debug (Bug in add productive css-codes)

1.0.50 – 7.13.2024

  • A lot of debugs & improvements (Core-Features)
  • Added new system to control wordpress custom-taxs

1.0.85 – 7.25.2024

  • Tailwind Css rendering debug (Bug with wordpress +6.6)
  • Tested with WordPress Version 6.6 and above
  • Added Cache-Compatibility option (Advanced Section)
  • Re-solved double css-class rendering in Gutenberg

1.2.00 – 7.30.2024

  • Enhanced all PHP-codes
  • Removed all heavy-queries
  • Tested with WordPress +6.6
  • Solves some Critical-issue Bugs (plugin settings)
  • Best Performance & Security with PHP +8 & WordPress +6.6

short_description: Tailwind-Framework for Wordpress (Fast & Optimized),Unparalleled Versatility, Advanced Elementor & Gutenberg integration and etc...
